biotools.summary:
Performing QTL and eQTL Analyses with the R-Package GenomicTools.

This Package is the continuation of the genomic analysis tools part of the GeneticTools package.

Website accompanying the R-package 'GenomicTools'.

Today the versions 0.2.8 for GenomicTools and 0.1.4 for GenomicTools.fileHandler have been released with a couple of bugfixes and a list of new features.
